title: R&A: No decision yet on Open - TSN
description: R&A: No decision yet on Open TSN R&A Denies Report Open Championship Canceled; Still Exploring Options Golf Channel Golf: Masters reportedly could move to November, U.S. Open could shift west to California The Province Report: Open Championship expected to be…
content: The R amp A said Thursday no decision has been made about the status of the Open Championship and that the organization is continuing to work through our options amid the COVID pandemic We are continuing to work through our options for The Open t chars
